Offer Industry.description: Which one of the following industries is the offer for: Auto-Sales, Auto-Service, Banking-Checking, Banking-Savings, Banking-Money Market, Banking-Debit Cards, Banking-Online, Banking-Certificates of Deposit, Banking-Guaranteed Investments, Banking-General, Insurance-Life, Insurance-Health, Insurance-Travel, Insurance-Personal Property and Casualty, Insurance-Commercial Property and Casualty, Insurance-General, Credit Cards, Investment, Mortgage and Loan, Retail, Shipping, Technology, Telecoms, Tobacco, Travel and Leisure.

Primary Company.description: The company who has sent this offer

Offer Type.description: If the intent of the piece is to acquire new business, Offer Type is Acquisition.

Incentive Description.description: What are the main offers being promoted by the text
